replies.bodyText:
2 questions here:


when you say "print out the kerberos config and keytab as an event" do you mean to log the locations being used as an INFO level message? That sounds reasonable to me.


Can you elaborate on what you mean by the pseudocode above? I don't think the Liberty code should be doing any parsing of the config/keytab files, or even specifying default values if unspecified. We should just delegate all of the config parsing and default values to whatever the JDK has
